patthana18.14:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
patthana18.14:0.3_0: There are necessities for the eon.
patthana18.14:1.1_0: There is no cause or reason for the sake of listening to an eon.
patthana18.14:10.1_0: Corrupt principles, not for the sake of worldly gain, nor for the sake of nymphs.
patthana18.14:11.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of worldly gain, not for the sake of purification of mind.
patthana18.14:12.1_0: Covering is not the principle for the sake of worldly gain, nor does one for the sake of worldly gain.
patthana18.14:13.1_0: Neither poised for the sake of worldly gain, not for the sake of material possessions. ...
patthana18.14:13.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana18.14:14.1_0: Because of this thing that doesn’t arise for some other reason.
patthana18.14:15.1_0: But they can’t definitely give rise to three things. For the sake of realizing it doesn’t give rise to sorrow.
patthana18.14:16.1_0: Nothing for the sake of deceiving this Teaching by means of causes and reasons, not for the sake of purification.
patthana18.14:17.1_0: Nothing for the sake of this quality, not for the sake of anything.
patthana18.14:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the reason for the sake of knowing and seeing.
patthana18.14:2.1_3: said that the sound of conditioned phenomena is found.
patthana18.14:3.1_0: There is no way for the sake of undefiled, not for the sake of seeing.
patthana18.14:4.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of unconfused teaching.
patthana18.14:5.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of passion.
patthana18.14:6.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of nymphs.
patthana18.14:7.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the formless teaching, the cause or condition for the sake of form.
patthana18.14:8.1_0: Not knowing and seeing form, the cause or condition for the sake of form.
patthana18.14:9.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for form, the reason for the sake of formless states.
